name: LTG Development Capital
overview: LTG Development Capital Ltd. is the principal investment arm of Lewis Trust Group specializing in early stage, development capital, flotation, and management buy-outs or buy-ins investments. In the management buyouts or buy-ins, the firm prefers to invest in small scale transactions. Within the early stage companies, it seeks to invest in the technology sector.
